sentences.en: A citadel and palace on a hill overlooking Granada, Spain.
sentences.cn: 爱尔罕布拉宫建在山顶俯视西班牙格拉纳达的一座堡垒及宫殿.

sentences.en: Day 6 : Built a citadel in the northern town.
He died for Germany in the gigantic and futile operation called Citadel.
sentences.cn: 他在被称为“城堡”行动的一次大规模的劳而无功的战役中阵亡.

sentences.en: He made a citadel of personal excellence.
Here was a citadel in the Second World War.
sentences.cn: 在二战中,这儿是一处避难所.

sentences.en: Second Gentleman. They give their greeting to the citadel; This likewise is a friend.
sentences.cn: 军官乙他们向我们城上放礼炮了; 到来的也是我们的朋友.

sentences.en: She thought about the Citadel charts folded there.
sentences.cn: 她想到了包里的城堡平面图.

sentences.en: Some of the rebels were killed in the act of storming the citadel.
sentences.cn: 一些反叛者在突袭城堡时被杀.

sentences.en: The business is no longer regarded as a citadel of commerce.
sentences.cn: 该行业不再被视为贸易的堡垒。

sentences.en: The citadel at Besancon towered above the river.
The citadel of the Commonwealth and Empire could not be stormed.
sentences.cn: 联邦和帝国的堡垒是攻不破的.

sentences.en: The Violet Citadel , Dalaran is destroyed by Dragons.
sentences.cn: 达拉然王国的紫罗兰城被龙摧毁.

sentences.en: This citadel is built on high ground for protecting the city.
sentences.cn: 这座城堡建于高处是为保护城市.

sentences.en: Towns with a Citadel attract more troops than a town with a Fort.
sentences.cn: 拥有大本营的城镇比拥有堡垒的更能吸引部队加入.

trans.tran_cn: 城堡，要塞，大本营，根据地，避难所，（军舰上的）炮廓
trans.tran_en: a strong  fort (= small castle )  built in the past as a place where people could go for safety if their city was attacked
